title: Trauma & Accident Care
description: Industrial employees, road and accident victims sustain injury to the bones, brain and abdomen, etc. The VGM Ortho & Multispecialty Team, with advanced infrastructure at VGM Hospital is well trained to handle such cases.

title: Anthroscopy & Sports Injuries
description: This advanced Key-Hole surgery of joints (usually knee and shoulder) enables ligament repairs on a day care basis. Faster pain relief, minimal blood loss, lower need for pain killers, faster rehabilitation make this an attractive option for all patients.

title: Joint Replacement Surgery
description: Bioclad OT Units strict antibiotic policy, titrated pain relief, regular education programs & post operative structured rehabilitation protocols makes life easy for our Knee/ Hip Replacement patients of International standards.

title: Spine Surgery
description: Back pain and Neck pains are a common source of misery in young IT/Marketing professionals and also the elderly. Disc prolapse, Nerve root compression, and Stenosis, Infections and many more Spine problems can be actively managed at VGM Ortho Centre.

title: Paedicatric Orthopedics
description: Children, unlike adults are prone to a wide range of unique ortho problems including birth/ growth disorders, infections, bone tumours and fractures. These challenging conditions needs attention and intervention from the best doctors in the field.

title: Physiotherapy
